company_info.Company Description: We are one of the growing full service Recruitment Solutions in India.Waays & Solutions is  specialized in  Human Resource service provider offering Manpower recruitment services to major Corporate & MNC’s in India.We recruit across a wide range of industries and at all position levels.Our primary activity is Permanent staff recruitment for either single, large volume or ongoing staffing requirements.We recruit at all employment levels from junior to senior and across a broad range of employee categories and sectors.

jd_information.description: Job profile :Tele-marketing ExecutiveAge :20-30yrsNote:Candidates should have good communication skills and should be Mumbai local.Job description:Candidate should be a minimum 12 th passShould be good in communication skills with a good thought process (English proficiency inparticular)Preferably should have atleast 6 months to 1 years experience in tele-marketing. Freshersare also considered provided they are absolutely familiar with the tele-marketing industryand the pressure involved in itShould be target oriented Should be comfortable working on Saturday & SundayWould get any one weekly off between Monday to Thursday.Candidates interested can forward their updated resumes on U or can call me on 7045787497.You also refer your friends who are looking the jobs for the same.Thankyou.RegardsAfsha7045787497.
